resources.string: Tamamochi
The ambient temperature is too low.
Please find a warmer place to stay.
The ambient temperature is too high.
Please find a colder place to stay.
The humidity is too high.
Please find a dryer place to stay.
The humidity is too low.
Please find a wetter place to stay.
The pressure of the air is too low.
Please don\'t stay in a high spot for too long.
The pressure of the air is too high.
Please find a lower spot.
The amount of CO2 in the air is too high.
Please open a window or find a spot with fresher air.
The light is too bright.
DIm the lights or find a darker spot to stay.
Your Tamamochi needs your assistance
Open the application to check your Tamamochi\'s status
